name: Downtown Mavka
description: Mavka is a mythic creature from the infinite Ukrainian forests. Her calling is to protect nature. But the heart of Nature was stolen and Mavka travels through the metaverse to search for it. Staying true to her roots, she wears glamour and protective suit to fit the futuristic environment of the digital space. Mavkaâ€™s look is based on the historical Ukrainian costume with traditional ornaments from different areas of the country.
